summary: DRIVING DOWN THE ROAD 2006 DODGE RAM 2500 HD, WITH THE 5.7 HEMI, THE 4WD AND 4LO LIGHT FLASHES AND TRIES TO ENGUAGE INTO 4X4. EVEN WHEN THE TRUCK IS IN THE DRIVEWAY, AND MOTOR IS OFF KEY OUT OF IGNITION U CAN STILL HEAR THE TRANSFER CASE MOTOR CLICKING IN AND OUT OF 4WD. I AM NOT THE FIRST TO REPORT THIS PROBLEM THERE IS A WHOLE FORM OF PEOPLE HAVING THIS PROBLEM. TOOK IT TO A TRANS SHOP THEY THINK IT MAY BE THE ACTUATOR BUT SAID THEY CANNOT GUARANTEE THATS IT. $500 TO DO THAT JOB. WHATS GOING ON HERE? I GOOGLED IT AND SEE MANY PEOPLE HAVE THE SAME PROBLEM BUT KNOW FIXES.   *JS
